Class DetailPostListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.api.core.common.IdentifiableEntityData
      • com.communote.server.web.api.to.listitem.CommonPostListItem

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class DetailPostListItem
extends CommonPostListItem
implements Serializable
    List item describing a note that should be used by the old API in versions since 1.0.1
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
    See Also:

        public Collection<AttachmentData> getAttachments()

        a collection with details about the attachments that were added to the note

        Returns:
        the date the note was created

      • getDiscussion

        public DiscussionListItem getDiscussion()
        Returns:
        an object with details about the discussion this note belongs to

      • getLastModificationDate

        public Date getLastModificationDate()
        Returns:
        the date of the last modification of the note

      • getNumberOfComments

        public int getNumberOfComments()
        Returns the number of replies to this note. This includes replies on replies and also replies that are direct messages which the current user might not be able to read.
        Returns:
        the number of replies

      • getParentPostId

        public Long getParentPostId()
        Returns:
        the ID of the parent note of the note or null if the note is not a comment

      • getParentUserId

        public Long getParentUserId()
        Returns:
        user ID of the author of the parent note of the note or null if the note is not a comment

      • getTags

        public String getTags()
        Returns:
        the tags of the note as CSV

      • getUserId

        public Long getUserId()
        Returns:
        the user ID of the author of the note

      • isDirect

        public boolean isDirect()
        Returns:
        whether the note is a direct message

      • isFavorite

        public boolean isFavorite()
        Returns:
        whether the current user marked the note as a favorite

      • setDirect

        public void setDirect(boolean direct)
        Parameters:
        direct - true if this note is a direct message, false otherwise

      • setDiscussion

        Sets the discussion

        discussion - object with details about the discussion this note belongs to

      • setFavorite

        public void setFavorite(boolean favorite)

        Parameters:

      • setNumberOfComments

        public void setNumberOfComments(int numberOfComments)
        Sets the number of replies to this note. This must include replies on replies and also replies that are direct messages which the current user might not be able to read.
        Parameters:
        numberOfComments - the number of replies

      • setParentPostId

        public void setParentPostId(Long parentPostId)
        Parameters:
        parentPostId - the ID of the parent note of the note or null if the note is not a comment

      • setParentUserId

        Parameters:
        parentUserId - user ID of the author of the parent note of the note or null if the note is not a comment

      • setTags

        public void setTags(String tags)
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags of the note as CSV

      • setUserId

        public void setUserId(Long userId)
        Parameters:
        userId - the user ID of the author of the note
